text: Oni sprashivayut tebya o novoluniyakh. Skazhi: Â«Oni opredelyayut promezhutki vremeni dlya lyudey i khadzha. Blagochestiye ne v tom, chtoby vy vkhodili v doma s ikh zadney storony. No blagochestiv tot, kto bogoboyaznen. Vkhodite v doma cherez dveri i boytes' Allakha, - byt' mozhet, vy okazhetes' preuspevshimi
